requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590, AMD Ryzen 5 2500U or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon RX 560X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • Storage: 20 GB available space
